discussion.title: pysr.install() not found
discussion.body:
I followed installation instructions through step 1 and 2. But when I try `python3 -c 'import pysr; pysr.install()'` , it says that there is no install in pysr.
This is what I got in pysr folder:

`__init__.py  __pycache__  export.py  feynman_problems.py  sr.py`

nodes.body: Looks like a very old version. Try `pip install -U pysr`
